name: Radiation soda (radiation jam)
description:
This is a very simple game, I recycled it from a missed jam (soda).

Your objective is to drink as many soda as possible, but due to a radiation issue, they don't want you to do this, so they are going to chase you and stop you.

You can use the WASD or arrow keys to move.

Or also the joystick or gamepad if you have one,

This game uses a new game engine, based on Unity: the XpCade engine (this is the version 2 (tutorials coming soon))

Learn more about it at spacespacesoftware.com
